message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and leave 10% for you.  We can work from here.
That's a very uneven split Alice.  I propose we go 60/40. It's important to make a deal quickly since the money loses value each round.
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split it 55/45. This way, we both get a decent amount, and we avoid further losses from inflation.
